title: Trinity Seven
synopsis: One day, the bright red sun stopped shining, causing the "Breakdown Phenomenon"â€”the destruction of Arata Kasuga's town and the disappearance of the people inhabiting it. All, however, is not yet lost; by utilizing the magical grimoire given to him by his childhood friend and cousin Hijiri Kasuga, Arata's world gets artificially reconstructed.
